func.title: ExtractLiquid

param.name: x
param.desc: X position at which material is extracted. Offset in local calls.

param.name: y
param.desc: Y position at which material is extracted. Offset in local calls.

func.desc: Sucks up one pixel of liquid at the specified position. Return value is the material number of the material actually extracted, or -1 if no liquid was there.

example.text: Sucks up one pixel of liquid and reinserts it 100 pixel further above.
